dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits rapid flowing streams.  Feeds on periphytic algae on rock surfaces.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Description
dataObjects.title: 描述
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: The Fish Database of Taiwan, available from http://fishdb.sinica.edu.tw
dataObjects.description: 體略呈圓筒形，尾柄部側扁。胸鰭以前的頭部呈扁平的鈍三角形。吻鈍圓，口前具吻溝及唇褶；鰓裂略寬，向下延伸可達腹面。口下位，橫裂；口四周有吻鬚及唇褶特化的短鬚，約有11根。下唇側後孔突特仆成疣狀突。體被細小圓鱗，頭部及胸部的內側均裸出無鱗。側線完全。背鰭基部較短，起點在腹鰭起點之前上方，軟條 3(不分枝軟條)+ 7(分枝軟條)；臀鰭2(不分枝軟條)+ 5(分枝軟條)；腹鰭1(不分枝軟條)+ 7-8(分枝軟條)；胸鰭寬大而平展，末端遠離腹鰭；尾鰭凹形。體色變異大，一般為全身暗黃褐色，體背及體側具有不規則的深褐色雲狀斑；各鰭淡黃褐色，或具有暗色點狀條紋。

agents.full_name: 台灣魚類資料庫(The Fish Database of Taiwan)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.title: 分布
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: The Fish Database of Taiwan, available from http://fishdb.sinica.edu.tw
dataObjects.description: 原認定為臺灣特有種，但進來發現有存在中國福建水系的同種族群。分布於臺灣北部及西部淡水河至濁水溪間的溪流中、上游流域。

agents.full_name: 台灣魚類資料庫(The Fish Database of Taiwan)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Asia: endemic to Taiwan.
dataObjects.references: Shao, K.-T. and P.L. Lim 1991 Fishes of freshwater and estuary. Encyclopedia of field guide in Taiwan. Recreation Press, Co., Ltd., Taipei. vol. 31. 240 p. (in Chinese). (Ref. 6898)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Southeast Asia.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.description: 12.0 cm TL (male/unsexed; (Ref. ))

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: 棲地
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: The Fish Database of Taiwan, available from http://fishdb.sinica.edu.tw
dataObjects.description: 初級淡水魚。喜好棲息於河川的中、上游湍急的河段。底棲性，常以扁平的身體及胸、腹鰭平貼在石頭上。雜食性，以刮食石頭上之藻類，以及捕食水生昆蟲、或攝食有機碎屑等為食。

agents.full_name: 台灣魚類資料庫(The Fish Database of Taiwan)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: demersal; freshwater; depth range 1 - 10 m (Ref. 6898)
dataObjects.references: Shao, K.-T. and P.L. Lim 1991 Fishes of freshwater and estuary. Encyclopedia of field guide in Taiwan. Recreation Press, Co., Ltd., Taipei. vol. 31. 240 p. (in Chinese). (Ref. 6898)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Threats
dataObjects.description: Not Evaluated

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Uses
dataObjects.title: 利用
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: The Fish Database of Taiwan, available from http://fishdb.sinica.edu.tw
dataObjects.description: 魚體較小，食用價值低，但其體色花紋富變化，生活習性特殊，或可飼養成觀賞魚。

agents.full_name: 台灣魚類資料庫(The Fish Database of Taiwan)
